name: Endless Haunting (Open Alpha)
description:
Its an Endless Runner, but you are a ghost... SO: "Endless Haunting" I guess! xD

There are four skins: Normal, Yellow, Black and the epic "King"

The Normal Mode is pretty easy and there will also spawn Hearts.

The Hard Mode is more difficult and there will not spawn Hearts but Souls which can be used to buy skins!
